70  /**
71   * Integration tests for container support of {@link Environment}
72   * interface.
73   *
74   * Tests all existing BeanFactory and ApplicationContext implementations to
75   * ensure that:
76   * - a standard environment object is always present
77   * - a custom environment object can be set and retrieved against the factory/context
78   * - the {@link EnvironmentAware} interface is respected
79   * - the environment object is registered with the container as a singleton
80   *   bean (if an ApplicationContext)
81   * - bean definition files (if any, and whether XML or @Configuration) are
82   *   registered conditionally based on environment metadata
83   *
84   * @author Chris Beams
85   */
86  @SuppressWarnings("resource")
87  public class EnvironmentIntegrationTests {
88  
89  	private ConfigurableEnvironment prodEnv;
90  
91  	private ConfigurableEnvironment devEnv;
92  
93  	private ConfigurableEnvironment prodWebEnv;
94  
95  
96  	@Before
97  	public void setUp() {
98  		prodEnv = new StandardEnvironment();
99  		prodEnv.setActiveProfiles(PROD_ENV_NAME);
100 
101 		devEnv = new StandardEnvironment();
102 		devEnv.setActiveProfiles(DEV_ENV_NAME);
103 
104 		prodWebEnv = new StandardServletEnvironment();
105 		prodWebEnv.setActiveProfiles(PROD_ENV_NAME);
106 	}
107 
108 	@Test
109 	public void genericApplicationContext_standardEnv() {
110 		ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx = new GenericApplicationContext(newBeanFactoryWithEnvironmentAwareBean());
111 		ctx.refresh();
112 
113 		assertHasStandardEnvironment(ctx);
114 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
115 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, ctx.getEnvironment());
116 	}
117 
118 	@Test
119 	public void genericApplicationContext_customEnv() {
120 		GenericApplicationContext ctx = new GenericApplicationContext(newBeanFactoryWithEnvironmentAwareBean());
121 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
122 		ctx.refresh();
123 
124 		assertHasEnvironment(ctx, prodEnv);
125 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
126 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, prodEnv);
127 	}
128 
129 	@Test
130 	public void xmlBeanDefinitionReader_inheritsEnvironmentFromEnvironmentCapableBDR() {
131 		GenericApplicationContext ctx = new GenericApplicationContext();
132 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
133 		new XmlBeanDefinitionReader(ctx).loadBeanDefinitions(XML_PATH);
134 		ctx.refresh();
135 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
136 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
137 	}
138 
139 	@Test
140 	public void annotatedBeanDefinitionReader_inheritsEnvironmentFromEnvironmentCapableBDR() {
141 		GenericApplicationContext ctx = new GenericApplicationContext();
142 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
143 		new AnnotatedBeanDefinitionReader(ctx).register(Config.class);
144 		ctx.refresh();
145 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
146 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
147 	}
148 
149 	@Test
150 	public void classPathBeanDefinitionScanner_inheritsEnvironmentFromEnvironmentCapableBDR_scanProfileAnnotatedConfigClasses() {
151 		// it's actually ConfigurationClassPostProcessor's Environment that gets the job done here.
152 		GenericApplicationContext ctx = new GenericApplicationContext();
153 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
154 		ClassPathBeanDefinitionScanner scanner = new ClassPathBeanDefinitionScanner(ctx);
155 		scanner.scan("org.springframework.core.env.scan1");
156 		ctx.refresh();
157 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
158 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
159 	}
160 
161 	@Test
162 	public void classPathBeanDefinitionScanner_inheritsEnvironmentFromEnvironmentCapableBDR_scanProfileAnnotatedComponents() {
163 		GenericApplicationContext ctx = new GenericApplicationContext();
164 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
165 		ClassPathBeanDefinitionScanner scanner = new ClassPathBeanDefinitionScanner(ctx);
166 		scanner.scan("org.springframework.core.env.scan2");
167 		ctx.refresh();
168 		assertThat(scanner.getEnvironment(), is((Environment)ctx.getEnvironment()));
169 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
170 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
171 	}
172 
173 	@Test
174 	public void genericXmlApplicationContext() {
175 		GenericXmlApplicationContext ctx = new GenericXmlApplicationContext();
176 		assertHasStandardEnvironment(ctx);
177 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
178 		ctx.load(XML_PATH);
179 		ctx.refresh();
180 
181 		assertHasEnvironment(ctx, prodEnv);
182 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
183 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, prodEnv);
184 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
185 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
186 	}

188 	@Test
189 	public void classPathXmlApplicationContext() {
190 		ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(XML_PATH);
191 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
192 		ctx.refresh();
193 
194 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
195 		assertHasEnvironment(ctx, prodEnv);
196 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, ctx.getEnvironment());
197 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
198 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
199 	}
200 
201 	@Test
202 	public void fileSystemXmlApplicationContext() throws IOException {
203 		ClassPathResource xml = new ClassPathResource(XML_PATH);
204 		File tmpFile = File.createTempFile("test", "xml");
205 		FileCopyUtils.copy(xml.getFile(), tmpFile);
206 
207 		// strange - FSXAC strips leading '/' unless prefixed with 'file:'
208 		ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx =
209 				new FileSystemXmlApplicationContext(new String[] {"file:" + tmpFile.getPath()}, false);
210 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
211 		ctx.refresh();
212 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
213 		assertHasEnvironment(ctx, prodEnv);
214 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, ctx.getEnvironment());
215 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
216 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
217 	}

225 
226 		ctx.register(EnvironmentAwareBean.class);
227 		ctx.refresh();
228 
229 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, prodEnv);
230 	}

234 		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
235 
236 		assertHasStandardEnvironment(ctx);
237 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
238 
239 		ctx.register(ProdConfig.class);
240 		ctx.refresh();
241 
242 		assertThat("should have prod bean", ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
243 	}

245 	@Test
246 	public void annotationConfigApplicationContext_withProdEnvAndDevConfigClass() {
247 		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
248 
249 		assertHasStandardEnvironment(ctx);
250 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
251 
252 		ctx.register(DevConfig.class);
253 		ctx.refresh();
254 
255 		assertThat("should not have dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
256 		assertThat("should not have transitive bean", ctx.containsBean(TRANSITIVE_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
257 	}

260 	public void annotationConfigApplicationContext_withDevEnvAndDevConfigClass() {
261 		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
262 
263 		assertHasStandardEnvironment(ctx);
264 		ctx.setEnvironment(devEnv);
265 
266 		ctx.register(DevConfig.class);
267 		ctx.refresh();
268 
269 		assertThat("should have dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
270 		assertThat("should have transitive bean", ctx.containsBean(TRANSITIVE_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
271 	}

273 	@Test
274 	public void annotationConfigApplicationContext_withImportedConfigClasses() {
275 		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
276 
277 		assertHasStandardEnvironment(ctx);
278 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
279 
280 		ctx.register(Config.class);
281 		ctx.refresh();
282 
283 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, prodEnv);
284 		assertThat("should have prod bean", ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
285 		assertThat("should not have dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
286 		assertThat("should not have transitive bean", ctx.containsBean(TRANSITIVE_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
287 	}

289 	@Test
290 	public void mostSpecificDerivedClassDrivesEnvironment_withDerivedDevEnvAndDerivedDevConfigClass() {
291 		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
292 		StandardEnvironment derivedDevEnv = new StandardEnvironment();
293 		derivedDevEnv.setActiveProfiles(DERIVED_DEV_ENV_NAME);
294 		ctx.setEnvironment(derivedDevEnv);
295 		ctx.register(DerivedDevConfig.class);
296 		ctx.refresh();
297 
298 		assertThat("should have dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
299 		assertThat("should have derived dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DERIVED_DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
300 		assertThat("should have transitive bean", ctx.containsBean(TRANSITIVE_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
301 	}
302 
303 	@Test
304 	public void mostSpecificDerivedClassDrivesEnvironment_withDevEnvAndDerivedDevConfigClass() {
305 		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
306 		ctx.setEnvironment(devEnv);
307 		ctx.register(DerivedDevConfig.class);
308 		ctx.refresh();
309 
310 		assertThat("should not have dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
311 		assertThat("should not have derived dev bean", ctx.containsBean(DERIVED_DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
312 		assertThat("should not have transitive bean", ctx.containsBean(TRANSITIVE_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
313 	}

374 	public void annotationConfigWebApplicationContext() {
375 		AnnotationConfigWebApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigWebApplicationContext();
376 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodWebEnv);
377 		ctx.setConfigLocation(EnvironmentAwareBean.class.getName());

381 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
382 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, prodWebEnv);
383 	}
384 
385 	@Test
386 	public void registerServletParamPropertySources_AbstractRefreshableWebApplicationContext() {
387 		MockServletContext servletContext = new MockServletContext();
388 		servletContext.addInitParameter("pCommon", "pCommonContextValue");
389 		servletContext.addInitParameter("pContext1", "pContext1Value");
390 
391 		MockServletConfig servletConfig = new MockServletConfig(servletContext);
392 		servletConfig.addInitParameter("pCommon", "pCommonConfigValue");
393 		servletConfig.addInitParameter("pConfig1", "pConfig1Value");
394 
395 		AbstractRefreshableWebApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigWebApplicationContext();
396 		ctx.setConfigLocation(EnvironmentAwareBean.class.getName());
397 		ctx.setServletConfig(servletConfig);
398 		ctx.refresh();
399 
400 		ConfigurableEnvironment environment = ctx.getEnvironment();
401 		assertThat(environment, instanceOf(StandardServletEnvironment.class));
402 		MutablePropertySources propertySources = environment.getPropertySources();
403 		assertThat(propertySources.contains(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME), is(true));
404 		assertThat(propertySources.contains(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONFIG_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME), is(true));
405 
406 		// ServletConfig gets precedence
407 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pCommon"), is("pCommonConfigValue"));
408 		assertThat(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONFIG_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME)),
409 				lessThan(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME))));
410 
411 		// but all params are available
412 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pContext1"), is("pContext1Value"));
413 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pConfig1"), is("pConfig1Value"));
414 
415 		// Servlet* PropertySources have precedence over System* PropertySources
416 		assertThat(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONFIG_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME)),
417 				lessThan(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME))));
418 
419 		// Replace system properties with a mock property source for convenience
420 		MockPropertySource mockSystemProperties = new MockPropertySource(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME);
421 		mockSystemProperties.setProperty("pCommon", "pCommonSysPropsValue");
422 		mockSystemProperties.setProperty("pSysProps1", "pSysProps1Value");
423 		propertySources.replace(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME, mockSystemProperties);
424 
425 		// assert that servletconfig params resolve with higher precedence than sysprops
426 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pCommon"), is("pCommonConfigValue"));
427 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pSysProps1"), is("pSysProps1Value"));
428 	}
429 
430 	@Test
431 	public void registerServletParamPropertySources_GenericWebApplicationContext() {
432 		MockServletContext servletContext = new MockServletContext();
433 		servletContext.addInitParameter("pCommon", "pCommonContextValue");
434 		servletContext.addInitParameter("pContext1", "pContext1Value");
435 
436 		GenericWebApplicationContext ctx = new GenericWebApplicationContext();
437 		ctx.setServletContext(servletContext);
438 		ctx.refresh();
439 
440 		ConfigurableEnvironment environment = ctx.getEnvironment();
441 		assertThat(environment, instanceOf(StandardServletEnvironment.class));
442 		MutablePropertySources propertySources = environment.getPropertySources();
443 		assertThat(propertySources.contains(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME), is(true));
444 
445 		// ServletContext params are available
446 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pCommon"), is("pCommonContextValue"));
447 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pContext1"), is("pContext1Value"));
448 
449 		// Servlet* PropertySources have precedence over System* PropertySources
450 		assertThat(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME)),
451 				lessThan(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME))));
452 
453 		// Replace system properties with a mock property source for convenience
454 		MockPropertySource mockSystemProperties = new MockPropertySource(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME);
455 		mockSystemProperties.setProperty("pCommon", "pCommonSysPropsValue");
456 		mockSystemProperties.setProperty("pSysProps1", "pSysProps1Value");
457 		propertySources.replace(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME, mockSystemProperties);
458 
459 		// assert that servletcontext init params resolve with higher precedence than sysprops
460 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pCommon"), is("pCommonContextValue"));
461 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pSysProps1"), is("pSysProps1Value"));
462 	}
463 
464 	@Test
465 	public void registerServletParamPropertySources_StaticWebApplicationContext() {
466 		MockServletContext servletContext = new MockServletContext();
467 		servletContext.addInitParameter("pCommon", "pCommonContextValue");
468 		servletContext.addInitParameter("pContext1", "pContext1Value");
469 
470 		MockServletConfig servletConfig = new MockServletConfig(servletContext);
471 		servletConfig.addInitParameter("pCommon", "pCommonConfigValue");
472 		servletConfig.addInitParameter("pConfig1", "pConfig1Value");
473 
474 		StaticWebApplicationContext ctx = new StaticWebApplicationContext();
475 		ctx.setServletConfig(servletConfig);
476 		ctx.refresh();
477 
478 		ConfigurableEnvironment environment = ctx.getEnvironment();
479 		MutablePropertySources propertySources = environment.getPropertySources();
480 		assertThat(propertySources.contains(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME), is(true));
481 		assertThat(propertySources.contains(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONFIG_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME), is(true));
482 
483 		// ServletConfig gets precedence
484 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pCommon"), is("pCommonConfigValue"));
485 		assertThat(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONFIG_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME)),
486 				lessThan(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME))));
487 
488 		// but all params are available
489 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pContext1"), is("pContext1Value"));
490 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pConfig1"), is("pConfig1Value"));
491 
492 		// Servlet* PropertySources have precedence over System* PropertySources
493 		assertThat(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardServletEnvironment.SERVLET_CONFIG_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME)),
494 				lessThan(propertySources.precedenceOf(PropertySource.named(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME))));
495 
496 		// Replace system properties with a mock property source for convenience
497 		MockPropertySource mockSystemProperties = new MockPropertySource(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME);
498 		mockSystemProperties.setProperty("pCommon", "pCommonSysPropsValue");
499 		mockSystemProperties.setProperty("pSysProps1", "pSysProps1Value");
500 		propertySources.replace(StandardEnvironment.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME, mockSystemProperties);
501 
502 		// assert that servletconfig params resolve with higher precedence than sysprops
503 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pCommon"), is("pCommonConfigValue"));
504 		assertThat(environment.getProperty("pSysProps1"), is("pSysProps1Value"));
505 	}

514

516 		ctx.refresh();
517

521 	}

539 	@Test
540 	public void xmlPortletApplicationContext() {
541 		AbstractRefreshablePortletApplicationContext ctx = new XmlPortletApplicationContext();
542 		ctx.setEnvironment(prodEnv);
543 		ctx.setConfigLocation("classpath:" + XML_PATH);
544 		ctx.refresh();
545 
546 		assertHasEnvironment(ctx, prodEnv);
547 		assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(ctx);
548 		assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ctx, prodEnv);
549 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(DEV_BEAN_NAME), is(false));
550 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(PROD_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
551 	}
552 
553 	@Test
554 	public void abstractApplicationContextValidatesRequiredPropertiesOnRefresh() {
555 		{
556 			ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
557 			ctx.refresh();
558 		}
559 
560 		{
561 			ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
562 			ctx.getEnvironment().setRequiredProperties("foo", "bar");
563 			try {
564 				ctx.refresh();
565 				fail("expected missing property exception");
566 			}
567 			catch (MissingRequiredPropertiesException ex) {
568 			}
569 		}
570 
571 		{
572 			ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
573 			ctx.getEnvironment().setRequiredProperties("foo");
574 			ctx.setEnvironment(new MockEnvironment().withProperty("foo", "fooValue"));
575 			ctx.refresh(); // should succeed
576 		}
577 	}
578 
579 
580 	private DefaultListableBeanFactory newBeanFactoryWithEnvironmentAwareBean() {
581 		DefaultListableBeanFactory bf = new DefaultListableBeanFactory();
582 		registerEnvironmentBeanDefinition(bf);
583 		return bf;
584 	}
585 
586 	private void registerEnvironmentBeanDefinition(BeanDefinitionRegistry registry) {
587 		registry.registerBeanDefinition(ENVIRONMENT_AWARE_BEAN_NAME,
588 				rootBeanDefinition(EnvironmentAwareBean.class).getBeanDefinition());
589 	}
590 
591 	private void assertEnvironmentBeanRegistered(
592 			ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx) {
593 		// ensure environment is registered as a bean
594 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(ENVIRONMENT_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
595 	}
596 
597 	private void assertHasStandardEnvironment(ApplicationContext ctx) {
598 		Environment defaultEnv = ctx.getEnvironment();
599 		assertThat(defaultEnv, notNullValue());
600 		assertThat(defaultEnv, instanceOf(StandardEnvironment.class));
601 	}
602 
603 	private void assertHasStandardServletEnvironment(WebApplicationContext ctx) {
604 		// ensure a default servlet environment exists
605 		Environment defaultEnv = ctx.getEnvironment();
606 		assertThat(defaultEnv, notNullValue());
607 		assertThat(defaultEnv, instanceOf(StandardServletEnvironment.class));
608 	}
609 
610 	private void assertHasStandardPortletEnvironment(WebApplicationContext ctx) {
611 		// ensure a default portlet environment exists
612 		Environment defaultEnv = ctx.getEnvironment();
613 		assertThat(defaultEnv, notNullValue());
614 		assertThat(defaultEnv, instanceOf(StandardPortletEnvironment.class));
615 	}
616 
617 	private void assertHasEnvironment(ApplicationContext ctx, Environment expectedEnv) {
618 		// ensure the custom environment took
619 		Environment actualEnv = ctx.getEnvironment();
620 		assertThat(actualEnv, notNullValue());
621 		assertThat(actualEnv, is(expectedEnv));
622 		// ensure environment is registered as a bean
623 		assertThat(ctx.containsBean(ENVIRONMENT_BEAN_NAME), is(true));
624 	}
625 
626 	private void assertEnvironmentAwareInvoked(ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx, Environment expectedEnv) {
627 		assertThat(ctx.getBean(EnvironmentAwareBean.class).environment, is(expectedEnv));
628 	}
629 
630 
631 	private static class EnvironmentAwareBean implements EnvironmentAware {
632 
633 		public Environment environment;
634 
635 		@Override
636 		public void setEnvironment(Environment environment) {
637 			this.environment = environment;
638 		}
639 	}
640 
641 
642 	/**
643 	 * Mirrors the structure of beans and environment-specific config files
644 	 * in EnvironmentIntegrationTests-context.xml
645 	 */
646 	@Configuration
647 	@Import({DevConfig.class, ProdConfig.class})
648 	static class Config {
649 		@Bean
650 		public EnvironmentAwareBean envAwareBean() {
651 			return new EnvironmentAwareBean();
652 		}
653 	}
654 
655 	@Profile(DEV_ENV_NAME)
656 	@Configuration
657 	@Import(TransitiveConfig.class)
658 	static class DevConfig {
659 		@Bean
660 		public Object devBean() {
661 			return new Object();
662 		}
663 	}
664 
665 	@Profile(PROD_ENV_NAME)
666 	@Configuration
667 	static class ProdConfig {
668 		@Bean
669 		public Object prodBean() {
670 			return new Object();
671 		}
672 	}
673 
674 	@Configuration
675 	static class TransitiveConfig {
676 		@Bean
677 		public Object transitiveBean() {
678 			return new Object();
679 		}
680 	}
681 
682 	@Profile(DERIVED_DEV_ENV_NAME)
683 	@Configuration
684 	static class DerivedDevConfig extends DevConfig {
685 		@Bean
686 		public Object derivedDevBean() {
687 			return new Object();
688 		}
689 	}
690 
691 
692 	/**
693 	 * Constants used both locally and in scan* sub-packages
694 	 */
695 	public static class Constants {
696 
697 		public static final String XML_PATH = "org/springframework/core/env/EnvironmentIntegrationTests-context.xml";
698 
699 		public static final String ENVIRONMENT_AWARE_BEAN_NAME = "envAwareBean";
700 
701 		public static final String PROD_BEAN_NAME = "prodBean";
702 		public static final String DEV_BEAN_NAME = "devBean";
703 		public static final String DERIVED_DEV_BEAN_NAME = "derivedDevBean";
704 		public static final String TRANSITIVE_BEAN_NAME = "transitiveBean";
705 
706 		public static final String PROD_ENV_NAME = "prod";
707 		public static final String DEV_ENV_NAME = "dev";
708 		public static final String DERIVED_DEV_ENV_NAME = "derivedDev";
709 	}
